actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by increasing the appropriation authorizations therein and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by increasing the appropriation authorization ceiling for: (1) the study of specified rivers; and (2) the acquisition of land and interests in land along the following river areas: Chattooga (North Carolina, South Carolina, and Georgia), Eleven Point (Missouri), Rouge (Oregon), Upper St. Croix (Minnesota and Wisconsin), and Salmon (Middle Fork, Idaho).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by increasing the appropriation authorizations therein and for other purposes.
